We have a different Thanksgiving celebration in Korea.
Here in the US, we always celebrate Thanksgiving on the fourth Thursday of November.

Yes. I really like Thanksgiving because it's a family holiday and it's not overly commercialized.
Well, it's not all about spending lots of money on presents,...
